analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal mdog ser po phyag drug pa'o/_/rtsha ba'i phyag gnyis ni

translated: He holds a flower bow in his left hand and a sword and a mirror in his two right hands. He holds a blue utpala flower and a red branch of an aśoka tree with flowers in his two left hands. He is blessed by Akṣobhya and has a topknot of hair. He stands with his left leg straight. He is sixteen years old and has a very beautiful body.

translated: Alternatively, he can be visualized as having four arms, but without the two hands that hold the mirror and the branch of an aśoka tree with flowers.🔽Then, having made him one with the wisdom being, one should recite the mantra:

analyzed: sems dpa' dang gcig _tu byas nas/_om many+dzu g+ho sha hrihdzah_zhes bya ba'i sngags

analyzed: bzlas pa bya'o/_/'bum phrag gcig bzlas la 'jig rten gsum po yang ci

analyzed: bgyi bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang na kha cig dgug par 'dod pas gong du

analyzed: yi ge hu~m dmar po dgu blta'o/_/de'i 'dab ma la g.yas skor du dbyangs

analyzed: yig dmar po bcu drug bsgom par byas nas/_de'i ze'u 'bru'i steng du nub
translated: On its petals, one should visualize the sixteen red vowel🔽ornaments in a clockwise direction.🔽On top of the pericarp, one should visualize a red sun and moon maṇḍala,

analyzed: mo dang nyin mo ji ltar srid par nyi ma dang /_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po'o/_/

translated: Then, having visualized those red vowels🔽as a swarm of bees, one should fill the ten directions with a mass of light🔽rays from one’s mantra.

analyzed: 'od zer gyi tshhogs kyis phyogs bcu bkang ste ji snyed mngon par 'dod pa'i bud
translated: Having gone to the place of the woman one desires, one should place

analyzed: med kyi gnas su song nas me rlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du stobs kyis bzhag
translated: the maṇḍala of fire and wind above her with force.

analyzed: nas 'od zer gyi rang bzhin nyid kyi zhags pas legs par ske nas bcings
translated: Having bound her neck well with a noose that is the nature of light rays,

analyzed: nas/_lcags kyu rnon pos chos 'byung nas phug ste mdun du yang dag par
translated: having pierced the dharmodaya with a sharp hook, and having summoned🔽her in front, one should place her palms together and insert her into the

analyzed: bkug nas thal mo sbyar te/_mgal me 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i nang du bcug

analyzed: nas yi ge hu~m dmar pos mig dang /_snying ga dang /_yan lag dang nying lag
translated: Having filled her eyes, heart, limbs, and minor limbs with a red🔽syllable hūṃ, one should meditate.

analyzed: thams cad bkang bar bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas de'i snying gar dbyangs yig
translated: Then, in her heart, one should visualize a red syllable oṃ.

analyzed: dmar zhing phra ba'i lcags kyu rab tu rnon po dang /_pad+ma'i sdong bu la gnas
translated: and the light of the syllable hrīḥ that is on the lotus stalk🔽goes above and summons the person for whom you are performing the rite,

analyzed: byung ste/_bsgrub bya'i sna bug g.yas pa'i sgo nas de'i snying gar zhugs te/_lcags

analyzed: kyu de yis de'i ming gi yi ge 'gugs par gnas par byed cing /_sbrang bu de

original: blta bar bya'o/_/de nas de kho na bzhin du dbugs kyis bskul ba'i lcags kyus🔽de'i ming stobs kyis blangs te/_sbrang bu de rnams kyis kyang /_rang gi🔽dbyangs yig bkug ste/_de'i sna bug g.yon pa'i lam du byung bar blta bar bya'o/🔽yang de blangs nas 'jug pa'i rlung gis lcags kyu dang /_sbrang bu rnams bkug

analyzed: ste/_rang gi sna bug g.yas pa'i sgo nas 'jug ste/_de'i ming gi yi ge rang gi

analyzed: snying ga'i sngags la bcug nas/_de'i ming gi yi ge rang gi snying ga'i sngags kyis

analyzed: drag por mnan nas/_dbyangs yig de rnams 'dab ma so so la sbrang bu

analyzed: mchog gis dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o zhes bya'o/_/rim pa

analyzed: yag lag med pa'i rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs

translated: Homage to the Lord of Speech!🔽First, the practitioner should rise early, clean his mouth,

analyzed: 'tshhal lo/_/dang po re zhig sgrub pa pos snga bar langs te kha la sogs pa dag
translated: and so forth,🔽enter the meditation hut,

original: par bya ste/_bsam gtan gyi khang par rab tu zhugs nas/_bde ba'i stan la
analyzed: par bya ste/_bsam gtan gyi khang par rab tu zhugs nas/_bde ba'i stan la
translated: and sit cross-legged on a comfortable seat.

original: skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas la/_snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba la dmar zhing
analyzed: skyil mo krung gis nye bar gnas la/_snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba la dmar zhing
translated: At his heart, on a lotus and moon,🔽he should visualize a red syllable oṃ,

original: dkar ba'i mu_bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas de'i 'od zer de'i tshhogs
analyzed: dkar ba'i mu_bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas de'i 'od zer de'i tshhogs
translated: which then emits light rays.🔽The light rays in the form of hooks

original: lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyis bkug ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'og nas 'byung ba'i
analyzed: lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyis bkug ste/_bcom ldan 'das 'og nas 'byung ba'i
translated: invite the Blessed One,

original: mdog dang /_zhal dang /_phyag mtshhan dang /_gdan dang /_nye bar
analyzed: mdog dang /_zhal dang /_phyag mtshhan dang /_gdan dang /_nye bar
translated: whose color, faces, hand implements, seat, and retinue🔽are as described below.

original: ldan pa mdun du rnam par bsgoms la/_yid kyis rang bzhin gyi me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/_de'i mdun du sdig pa
analyzed: ldan pa mdun du rnam par bsgoms la/_yid kyis rang bzhin gyi me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/_de'i mdun du sdig pa
translated: Visualize the deity in front of you, and mentally offer flowers, incense, and so forth.

original: bshags pa la sogs pa thams cad byas shing byams pa la sogs pa tshhangs pa'i🔽mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub🔽gnas bzhi rnam par bsgoms nas/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon du
analyzed: bshags pa la sogs pa thams cad byas shing byams pa la sogs pa tshhangs pa'i mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub gnas bzhi rnam par bsgoms nas/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mngon du
translated: In front of that deity, confess all your misdeeds and so forth, and cultivate love and so forth.🔽Visualize the four places of accomplishment of the recitation of the dhāraṇī of Akṣobhya.

original: bya ste/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko\u0f85 ham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin
analyzed: bya ste/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko\u0f85 ham zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis byin
translated: Then, actualize all phenomena as emptiness and bless yourself with the mantra:🔽oṃ śūnyatā jñāna vajra svabhāva ātmako ’haṃ

original: gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha' la hum gis rdo rje rtshe lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms la/_de'i 'od zer rnams kyis ji lta ba'i sbyor bas
analyzed: gyis brlab par bya'o/_/de nas nam mkha' la hum gis rdo rje rtshe lnga pa sa bon dang bcas pa rnam par bsgoms la/_de'i 'od zer rnams kyis ji lta ba'i sbyor bas
translated: Then, visualize a five-pronged vajra marked with hūṃ in the sky, and with the light rays of that vajra,

original: rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje'i gur dang /_sa 'og kun rdo rje'i_sa gzhir
analyzed: rdo rje'i ra ba dang /_rdo rje'i gur dang /_sa 'og kun rdo rje'i_sa gzhir
translated: create the enclosure of vajras, the canopy of vajras, and the vajra ground below.

original: dmigs la rdo rje yang 'od zer du gyur nas rdo rje'i ra ba las phyi rol tu phyogs
analyzed: dmigs la rdo rje yang 'od zer du gyur nas rdo rje'i ra ba las phyi rol tu phyogs
translated: The vajra in the visualization also becomes light rays and leaves the vajra fence.

original: bcing ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar gnas par blta'o/_/de'i rjes
analyzed: bcing ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis nye bar gnas par blta'o/_/de'i rjes
translated: It is seen to be situated outside in the form of a binding and so forth.

original: su rdo rje ra ba'i nang du hrih_yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'o/_/pad+ma'i steng du a las
analyzed: su rdo rje ra ba'i nang du hrih_yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'o/_/pad+ma'i steng du a las
translated: After that, inside the vajra fence, hrih becomes a lotus.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du dkar dmar gyi mu_yig la sangs rgyas
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/_/de'i steng du dkar dmar gyi mu_yig la sangs rgyas
translated: On top of the lotus, from a, there is a moon maṇḍala.

original: mang po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par bsgoms la/_de yongs su gyur pa las rje
analyzed: mang po spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rnam par bsgoms la/_de yongs su gyur pa las rje
translated: On top of that, meditate on the form of the white and red mu syllable, from which many buddhas emanate and reabsorb.

original: btshun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dmar zhing dkar ba pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje
analyzed: btshun 'jam pa'i dbyangs dmar zhing dkar ba pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng na rdo rje
translated: That completely transforms into oneself as the venerable Mañjuśrī, red and white, on a lotus and moon, with the vajra posture.

original: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_zhal dang po dmar po g.yas sngon po g.yon
analyzed: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_zhal dang po dmar po g.yas sngon po g.yon
translated: The first face is red, the right is blue, and the left is white.

original: dkar po zhes bya ba'i zhal zhal pa bsgom mo/_/phyag bzhi na ji lta ba'i sbyor
analyzed: dkar po zhes bya ba'i zhal zhal pa bsgom mo/_/phyag bzhi na ji lta ba'i sbyor
translated: Meditate on the faces. The four hands hold the same implements as before.

original: bas shes rab kyi po ti dang ral gri dang /_gzhu dang /_mda' dang ldan pas so/_/
analyzed: bas shes rab kyi po ti dang ral gri dang /_gzhu dang /_mda' dang ldan pas so/_/
translated: He is endowed with a book, sword, bow, and arrow of wisdom.

original: rin po che'i dbu rgyan mtshhan sum cu rtsha gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po po  _brgyad
analyzed: rin po che'i dbu rgyan mtshhan sum cu rtsha gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po po  _brgyad
translated: He is beautified by the thirty-two marks and the eighty🔽minor marks. He is youthful and adorned with the ornaments of

original: cus rnam par mdzes pa/_gzhon zhing gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan
analyzed: cus rnam par mdzes pa/_gzhon zhing gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan
translated: youth.

original: par bdag nyid bsgoms la/_snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje sems ma🔽dkar mo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_g.yon na dril bu dkur
analyzed: par bdag nyid bsgoms la/_snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje sems ma dkar mo sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/_g.yon na dril bu dkur
translated: Meditate on yourself as having the form of Vajradhara. At your heart,🔽on a lotus and moon, is white Vajrasattva, who sits in the bodhisattva🔽posture. He holds a bell to his left shoulder and a vajra at his heart

original: brten cing 'chang ba'o/_/g.yas pa na rang gi snying gar 'degs par byed pa'i🔽sbyor bas rdo rje 'chang ba smin mtshhams su de bzhin du rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo
analyzed: brten cing 'chang ba'o/_/g.yas pa na rang gi snying gar 'degs par byed pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje 'chang ba smin mtshhams su de bzhin du rin chen rdo rje ma ser mo

original: phyag gnyis kyis spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba 'ching zhing nye bar gnas pa'o/_/
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba 'ching zhing nye bar gnas pa'o/_/

analyzed: mgrin par pad+ma rdo rje ma dmar zhing dkar ba/_g.yon pas pad+ma'i sdong bu

analyzed: 'gying bag dang bcas pa bzung ba/_g.yas pas de'i 'dab ma kha 'byed cing

analyzed: sngon bzhin du de nyid nye bar gnas pa'o/_/spyi bor las kyi rdo rje ma sku mdog
translated: At the crown is green Karma Vajrī,

analyzed: ljang gu rdo rje rtshe gsum pa dang ldan pa'i phyag gnyis bdag nyid kyi spyi bor 'chang
translated: holding a three-pronged vajra above her head with both hands

original: zhing de kho na bzhin du nye bar gnas par bsgom par bya'o/_/om badzra ang+ku sha dza
analyzed: zhing de kho na bzhin du nye bar gnas par bsgom par bya'o/_/om badzra ang+ku sha dza
translated: and standing in the same way as before.🔽With the mantras oṃ vajra aṅkuśa jaḥ,

original: om badzra pa sha hu~m/_om badzra spo ta bam/_om badzra a be sha hoh_zhes pa'i sngags kyis🔽pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug
analyzed: om badzra pa sha hu~m/_om badzra spo ta bam/_om badzra a be sha hoh_zhes pa'i sngags kyis pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du go rims ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug

original: pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /_dbang du bya'o/_/rdo rje khu tshhur
analyzed: pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /_dbang du bya'o/_/rdo rje khu tshhur

analyzed: gnyis bcings te mdzub mo dang /_mthe'u chung lcags sgrog tu byas shing

original: /sprad pa bkan te rang gi kha ru nye bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste/
analyzed: /sprad pa bkan te rang gi kha ru nye bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste/

original: any+nyam dang zhal bsil dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag
analyzed: any+nyam dang zhal bsil dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa la sogs pas yang dag
translated: With the anjali gesture, water for the mouth, flowers, incense, and so on,

analyzed: par mchod la skad cig gis rang gi lus la gzhug par bya'o/_/de'i rjes su de

original: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro bas/
analyzed: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba sngon du 'gro bas/
translated: After that, imagine that all tathagatas confer empowerment,🔽and Akṣobhya adorns one’s head.

original: mi bskyod pas bdag nyid kyi dbu brgyan par rnam par bsams la/_om /🔽d+harma a b+ha ba swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+ha/_badzra a a am a pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha
analyzed: mi bskyod pas bdag nyid kyi dbu brgyan par rnam par bsams la/_om / d+harma a b+ha ba swa b+ha wa bi shud+d+ha/_badzra a a am a pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+ha
translated: Om🔽dharmasvabhāva svabhāva viśuddha🔽vajra āḥ āḥ aṃ a prakṛtipariśuddha

analyzed: sarba d+harma ya du ta/_sarba ta tha ga ta dz+nya na ka ya many+dzu shri pa ri shud+d+hi ta/_mu pa da ya
translated: sarvadharma yaduta sarvatathāgatājñānakāya mañjuśrīpariśuddha murapadāya

analyzed: ti/_a ah_sarba ta tha ga ta hri da ya/_ha ra ha ra/_om hu~m hrih_ga

analyzed: ga /_dz+nya na murti/_ba gi shwa ra/_ma ha pa tsha/_sarba d+harma/_ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/_d+harma d+ha tu dz+nya na gar+b+ha ah_zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dang po

original: dang /_bar ma dang /_mthar byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas/_rje
analyzed: dang /_bar ma dang /_mthar byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro bas/_rje
translated: The above mantra is for the preliminary consecration of the beginning,🔽middle, and end.

original: dang /_bar ma dang / btshun mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa nyi ma re re zhing so so'i thun mtshhams su🔽mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/
analyzed: dang /_bar ma dang / btshun mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa nyi ma re re zhing so so'i thun mtshhams su mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs/
translated: Then, in the morning and evening sessions,

original: lan gsum mam lan gcig tu skyil mo krung ma zhig par mnyam par gzhag par
analyzed: lan gsum mam lan gcig tu skyil mo krung ma zhig par mnyam par gzhag par
translated: recite the Praise in Sequence three or one time without breaking the cross-legged posture.

original: bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar ji srid grub pa'i mtshhan ma mthong bar de srid bklag
analyzed: bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar ji srid grub pa'i mtshhan ma mthong bar de srid bklag
translated: In this way, recite until the signs of accomplishment are seen.

original: par bya'o/_/de'i rjes su rgyud ji lta ba bzhin dngos grub kyi thabs la rjes su
analyzed: par bya'o/_/de'i rjes su rgyud ji lta ba bzhin dngos grub kyi thabs la rjes su
translated: After that, in accordance with the tantra, practice the means of accomplishment.

original: gnas par bya'o/_/mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: gnas par bya'o/_/mtshhan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//_//
translated: The means of accomplishment of the Litany of the Names is complete.

original: pan+di ta don yod rdo rje dang ba ri lo tsha bas bsgyur ba'o//_//🔽@ga    @#/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dpa' bo
analyzed: pan+di ta don yod rdo rje dang ba ri lo tsha bas bsgyur ba'o//_// @ga    @#/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dpa' bo
translated: It was translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the translator Ba-ri Lotsāwa.

original: gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/🔽@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya mdzi badzra sid+d+hi ka bi ra sa d+ha nam/_bod
analyzed: gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya mdzi badzra sid+d+hi ka bi ra sa d+ha nam/_bod
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of Noble Mañjuvajra, the Sole Hero🔽In Sanskrit: ārya-mañjuvajra-siddhi-kā-vikrama-sādhana

original: skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/🔽'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/ston ka'i zla 'dra'i 'od gsal
analyzed: skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/ston ka'i zla 'dra'i 'od gsal
translated: In Tibetan: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dpal brtul zhugs gcig pa'i sgrub thabs🔽Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī!🔽I pay homage to Mañjuvajra,🔽whose clear light is like the autumn moon,

original: ba'i/_/'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshhal/_/de yi sgrub thabs gsal po mchog/🔽mdor bsdus bdag gis brjod par bgyi/_/dang por re zhig sngags pas yid
analyzed: ba'i/_/'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshhal/_/de yi sgrub thabs gsal po mchog/ mdor bsdus bdag gis brjod par bgyi/_/dang por re zhig sngags pas yid
translated: and will explain his supreme, clear means of accomplishment🔽in brief.🔽First, the practitioner should sit on a comfortable seat🔽in a secluded place that is to his liking,

original: dang mthun pa'i gtshang ma'i sa phyogs su bde ba'i gdan la bsdad nas/_rang
analyzed: dang mthun pa'i gtshang ma'i sa phyogs su bde ba'i gdan la bsdad nas/_rang
translated: and, having gone for refuge and given rise to the mind of awakening,

analyzed: gi snying gar am yig las byung ba'i zla ba la mam dkar po de nyid rnam par dgod
translated: In the heart of that moon is a white maṃ syllable, which you visualize radiating light.

original: par bya'o/_/de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' gang bas bcom ldan 'das bla ma
analyzed: par bya'o/_/de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' gang bas bcom ldan 'das bla ma
translated: That light fills the sky, and you imagine that the transcendent conquerors,🔽the buddhas, and the bodhisattvas, the spiritual heroes, are gathered in the sky before you.

original: rje btshun nam mkha' la bltas te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du
analyzed: rje btshun nam mkha' la bltas te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du
translated: Then, in the presence of the transcendent conquerors,

analyzed: gnas la yid kyis rang bzhin gyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
translated: you make offerings to the transcendent conqueror Mañjuśrī with mental offerings.

original: mchod de/_dge ba spel ba'i don du sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par
analyzed: mchod de/_dge ba spel ba'i don du sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par
translated: For the sake of increasing your virtue, you should confess each and every nonvirtue,

analyzed: bgyi ba dang /_bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_de yang
translated: rejoice in all merit,🔽and dedicate it to unsurpassed buddhahood.

original: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba dang byang
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba dang byang
translated: Until you attain enlightenment, you should go for refuge to the Buddha, the

original: chub kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
analyzed: chub kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi
translated: Dharma, and the Saṅgha,

original: ba dang /_yang dag pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de nas
analyzed: ba dang /_yang dag pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de nas
translated: and you should generate the awakening mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das rang gi sa bon dang lhan cig tu gyur par blta'o/_/khams
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rang gi sa bon dang lhan cig tu gyur par blta'o/_/khams
translated: The Bhagavān is to be seen as being together with his seed.

original: gsum po g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
analyzed: gsum po g.yo ba dang /_mi g.yo ba thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
translated: All the moving and unmoving of the three realms are dependently originated.

original: rnam par dpyad mi bzod pa/_rmi lam sgyu ma gzugs brnyan lta bur bsams te/
analyzed: rnam par dpyad mi bzod pa/_rmi lam sgyu ma gzugs brnyan lta bur bsams te/
translated: They are unable to withstand analysis, like a dream, an illusion, or a reflection.

analyzed: 'di gcig tu rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid du
translated: This is to be meditated on as being completely pure by nature,🔽radiant light.

original: bsgom par bya'o/_/om swa b+ha wa shud+d+hasarba d+harma b+ha wa wa \u0f85 \u0f85ham/_zhes bya ba
analyzed: bsgom par bya'o/_/om swa b+ha wa shud+d+hasarba d+harma b+ha wa wa \u0f85 \u0f85ham/_zhes bya ba

analyzed: 'dis brtan par bya'o/_/yang na sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs las byung ba'i zla
translated: Alternatively, imagine that from the power of previous aspirations,

analyzed: ba la mam rnam par bsams te/_de'i 'od 'phros pas rma 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i
translated: a moon maṇḍala arises, and from the light radiating from that,

original: bdag nyid bcug ste bdag nyid mam las byung ba bsam par bya'o/_/ston ka'i
analyzed: bdag nyid bcug ste bdag nyid mam las byung ba bsam par bya'o/_/ston ka'i
translated: one should imagine oneself as Mañjuvajra, arisen from the letter maṃ.🔽One should imagine oneself as having the form of the autumn moon,🔽with five locks of hair, adorned with all ornaments,

original: zla ba'i rnam pa can gtshug phud lnga pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phyag
analyzed: zla ba'i rnam pa can gtshug phud lnga pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_phyag

analyzed: /'phral du nyams myong 'jam dpal gyi/_/sgrub thabs legs

analyzed: zla ba'i 'od dang 'dra bar mdzes pa sna tshhogs pad+ma la gnas pa'i zla ba la sems

analyzed: bzhin gyis rnam par dag par mos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgoms

analyzed: la gnyug ma'i sngags/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa lnga  ko\u0f85 ham zhes brjod

analyzed: zer gyis bgegs rnams bskrad de/_sems can gyi don byed pa la sogs pa'i khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi rnam pa spro zhing bsdu ste/_skad cig gis de yongs su

analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o/_/kha cig gis ni zhal drug zhabs drug par 'dod do//

analyzed: zhal mche ba gtshigs pa/_spyan dmar ba'o/_/g.yas kyi phyag gsum na 'khor

analyzed: po dang /_nag po go rims bzhin du blta'o/_/de nas snying ga'i sa bon

translated: the one who is the good being, the one who is the creator of this,🔽 the one who is the accomplisher of speech,

analyzed: yis ngag ni sgrub byed pa/_/ngag gi dbang phyug de 'gyur shog_/rdo rje chos
translated: the one who is the lord of speech, may he be.

original: kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon su dza na b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//🔽@#/_/seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/🔽@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_si ha na da sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_seng
analyzed: kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon su dza na b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_// @#/_/seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/ @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_si ha na da sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_seng
translated: The sādhana of Vajradharma composed by Master Sujanabhadra is complete.🔽The Sādhana of Siṃhanāda🔽In Sanskrit: Siṃhanāda-sādhana🔽In Tibetan: Seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs

original: ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por
analyzed: ge sgra'i sgrub thabs/_'phags pa seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang por
translated: Homage to the noble Siṃhanāda!🔽First, the mantra practitioner, having washed the face and so forth,

original: re zhig sngags pas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas/_bde ba'i gdan la
analyzed: re zhig sngags pas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas nas/_bde ba'i gdan la
translated: on a comfortable seat,

original: 'dug ste/_rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hrih
analyzed: 'dug ste/_rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge hrih
translated: The yogi should visualize the syllable hrih on a moon disc in his heart.

original: bltas la/_mdun du bla ma dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems🔽dpa' rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la mchod pa dang /_sdig pa
analyzed: bltas la/_mdun du bla ma dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgom par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la mchod pa dang /_sdig pa
translated: He should visualize the guru, the buddhas, and the bodhisattvas in front of him.

original: bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya
analyzed: bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ste/_om shu n+ya ta dz+nya
translated: After that, he should make offerings, confess his sins, and so forth, and then meditate on emptiness.

original: na badzra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko\u0f85_ham zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs la/_de nas
analyzed: na badzra swa b+ha wa at+ma ko\u0f85_ham zhes brjod pas byin gyis brlabs la/_de nas
translated: He should bless himself by reciting: Om shunyata jnana vajra svabhava atmako ham.

original: skad cig tsham gyis yi ge pam yongs su gyur pa las/_pad+ma dmar po de'i steng du🔽yi ge sa yongs su gyur pa las seng ge dkar po/_de'i steng du zla ba la hrihlas
analyzed: skad cig tsham gyis yi ge pam yongs su gyur pa las/_pad+ma dmar po de'i steng du yi ge sa yongs su gyur pa las seng ge dkar po/_de'i steng du zla ba la hrihlas
translated: Then, in an instant, he should visualize a lotus flower arising from the transformation of the syllable pam.🔽On top of that, from the transformation of the syllable sa, he should visualize a white lion.

original: yang dag par byung ba'i rje btshun seng ge sgra'i sku gzugs su bsgom ste/_sku
analyzed: yang dag par byung ba'i rje btshun seng ge sgra'i sku gzugs su bsgom ste/_sku
translated: On top of that, on a moon disc, from the syllable hrih, he should visualize the form of the noble Lion of Speech.

original: mdog dkar po ral pa'i thor tshhugs can/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag gnyis pa/
analyzed: mdog dkar po ral pa'i thor tshhugs can/_spyan gsum pa/_phyag gnyis pa/
translated: He should visualize the form of the noble Lion of Speech as white in color, with hair in a topknot, three eyes, and two arms.

original: dka' thub can gyi cha byad 'dzin pa/_rgyal po rol pas gnas pa'o/_/phyag
analyzed: dka' thub can gyi cha byad 'dzin pa/_rgyal po rol pas gnas pa'o/_/phyag
translated: He has the appearance of an ascetic and is seated in the posture of royal poise.

original: g.yon pas ni pad+ma bsgreng ba'i steng na ral gri 'bar bas brgyan pa'o/_/g.yas🔽su sbrul dkar pos dkris pa'i mdung rtshe gsum pa'o/_/g.yon du dri zhim po'i me
analyzed: g.yon pas ni pad+ma bsgreng ba'i steng na ral gri 'bar bas brgyan pa'o/_/g.yas su sbrul dkar pos dkris pa'i mdung rtshe gsum pa'o/_/g.yon du dri zhim po'i me
translated: In his left hand he holds a sword, which is adorned with a blazing lotus.🔽To his right is a spear with three prongs, wrapped in a white snake.

original: tog gi tshhogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa dkar po'o/_/sku las de bzhin gshegs
analyzed: tog gi tshhogs kyis bkang ba'i thod pa dkar po'o/_/sku las de bzhin gshegs
translated: To his left is a white skull cup filled with a heap of fragrant flowers.🔽Meditate on him as an emanated form from which the five tathagatas emanate.

original: pa lnga 'phro ba'i sprul pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/_/
analyzed: pa lnga 'phro ba'i sprul pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/_/
translated: Recite this mantra:🔽Om dhi simhanada hum phat.

original: om / d+hi sim ha na  da hu~m phat/_sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par🔽bya'o/_/de nas na mo rat+na tra ya ya/_na ma ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya bo d+hi🔽satwa ya/_ma ha ya/_ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/_tad+ya tha/_om a ka te/
analyzed: om / d+hi sim ha na  da hu~m phat/_sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas na mo rat+na tra ya ya/_na ma ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa ra ya bo d+hi satwa ya/_ma ha ya/_ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/_tad+ya tha/_om a ka te/
translated: Recite this mantra one hundred thousand times as a preliminary.🔽Then recite this mantra:🔽Namah ratnatrayaya, nama arya avalokitesvara bodhisattvasya, mahasattvasya, mahakari-nikaya, tadyatha om akate,

original: bi ka te/_ni ka te/_ka tam ka te/_ka ro ta bir+ya l+luswa ha/_'di'i nye bar
analyzed: bi ka te/_ni ka te/_ka tam ka te/_ka ro ta bir+ya l+luswa ha/_'di'i nye bar
translated: vikate, nikate, katamkate, karota virya lusva ha.

original: spyod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du gzungs sngags 'dis sa la ma lhung🔽ba'i lci bas man+dal brgyad phul te/_man+dal re re zhing lan bcu gsum bcu
analyzed: spyod pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du gzungs sngags 'dis sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas man+dal brgyad phul te/_man+dal re re zhing lan bcu gsum bcu
translated: The practice is as follows: in front of an image of the Blessed One, offer eight maṇḍalas with clay that has not fallen to the ground

original: gsum brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lci ba lhag ma de nyid la mngon par bsngags te/
analyzed: gsum brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lci ba lhag ma de nyid la mngon par bsngags te/
translated: and recite the dhāraṇī mantra thirteen times for each maṇḍala.

original: lus la nye bar byugs na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te
analyzed: lus la nye bar byugs na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te
translated: Then, anoint your body with that remaining clay, and all illnesses will be pacified.

original: mtshhams med pa'i las byas kyang nyi ma bdun nam/_bcu bzhi'am/_nyi shu rtsha
analyzed: mtshhams med pa'i las byas kyang nyi ma bdun nam/_bcu bzhi'am/_nyi shu rtsha
translated: If you perform the rite without interruption, but it is not accomplished in seven, fourteen, or twenty-one days,

original: gcig gis ma grub na de'i tshhe bdag gis mtshhams med pa lnga byas pa yin no/_/
analyzed: gcig gis ma grub na de'i tshhe bdag gis mtshhams med pa lnga byas pa yin no/_/
translated: then you have not performed the five rites without interruption.

original: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs slob dpon tshan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs slob dpon tshan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//

original: pan+di ta don yod rdo rje dang /_khams pa lo tsha ba dge slong ba ris🔽bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: pan+di ta don yod rdo rje dang /_khams pa lo tsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//_//

original: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs
analyzed: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs
translated: The sādhana of Siṃhanāda🔽The sādhana of Halāhala

original: @ga  @#/_/ha la ha la'i sgrub thabs/🔽sa la
analyzed: @ga  @#/_/ha la ha la'i sgrub thabs/🔽sa la
translated: The sādhana of Sālṣṭi

original: / @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ha la ha la sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_ha
analyzed: / @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ha la ha la sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_ha
translated: In Tibetan: Halaha-la'i sgrub thabs

analyzed: la ha la'i sgrub thabs/_bcom ldan 'das ha la ha la la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/
translated: Homage to the Bhagavan Halahala!🔽I pay homage with devotion to Halahala,

original: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/_/ha la ha lar gus phyag 'tshhal/
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i/_/ha la ha lar gus phyag 'tshhal/
translated: who fulfills all wishes.🔽I will explain in brief the means of accomplishment

analyzed: snying rje'i bdag nyid sgrub pa'i thabs/_/mdor bsdus de ni brjod par bya/_/

analyzed: dang por yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su tshan+dan la sogs pas legs par byugs

analyzed: la thang ka la sogs pa gnas par bzhugs su gsol te bcom ldan 'das la

analyzed: mchod par bya'o/_/me tog la sogs pa dbul ba'i sngags ni/_om badzra pu hum/
translated: Make offerings to the Bhagavan. The mantra for offering flowers, etc. is:🔽Om vajra puhoom🔽Om vajra dhupe hoom🔽Om vajra dipa hoom🔽Om vajra gandhe hoom

original: om badzra d+hu pe hu~m/_om badzra di pe hum/_om badzra gar+b+he hum/_om badzra nai bi bye🔽hu~m zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/_/om sarba ta tha ga ta pu dza me g+ha pra sa ra sa

analyzed: mu tra spa ra hi mam ga ga na kham hum mchod pa thams cad dbul ba'i sngags so/_/
translated: Mūtra sparāhiṃ gaṅaṇa khaṃ huṃ is the mantra for offering all worship.🔽Having made offerings, in front of him,

analyzed: rab tu mchod la de'i mdun du/_/bde ba'i stan la rab gnas te/_/'gro la la la la'i la'i sgrub thabs/
translated: seated on a comfortable seat,🔽one should meditate on love🔽and also on great compassion.

original: byams pa rnam par bsgom/_/snying rje yang ni brtshe chen pos/_/zla
analyzed: byams pa rnam par bsgom/_/snying rje yang ni brtshe chen pos/_/zla
translated: On a moon disc,🔽the mantrin should visualize at the heart

original: ba'i steng du ni/_/sngags pas snying gar dgod par bya/_/sangs rgyas sras
analyzed: ba'i steng du ni/_/sngags pas snying gar dgod par bya/_/sangs rgyas sras
translated: the Buddhas and their sons,🔽clearly visualized, filling the sky.

original: bcas gsal por ni/_/nam mkha' gang bar blta bar bya/_/hrih_yig 'od zer
analyzed: bcas gsal por ni/_/nam mkha' gang bar blta bar bya/_/hrih_yig 'od zer

original: mchod pas ni/_/de la rab tu bskor zhing mchod/_/sdig pa la sogs bshags
analyzed: mchod pas ni/_/de la rab tu bskor zhing mchod/_/sdig pa la sogs bshags

original: par bya/_/bsod nams 'phel phyir bya ba ni/_/mchog gsum skyabs 'gro la
analyzed: par bya/_/bsod nams 'phel phyir bya ba ni/_/mchog gsum skyabs 'gro la
translated: one should go for refuge to the Three Jewels🔽and so forth. One should recite these mantras:

original: sogs bya/_/sngags 'di dag ni brjod bya ste/_/chos rnams bdag ni med pa'i
analyzed: sogs bya/_/sngags 'di dag ni brjod bya ste/_/chos rnams bdag ni med pa'i
translated: The supreme selflessness of phenomena🔽is illuminated by compassion.

original: mchog_/snying rje yis ni gsal byed pa/_/om swa b+ha wa shud+d+hasarba d+harmaswa b+ha
analyzed: mchog_/snying rje yis ni gsal byed pa/_/om swa b+ha wa shud+d+hasarba d+harmaswa b+ha

original: wa wa \u0f85_ham/_zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don mngon du byas pa/_dngos po dang bcas bdag nyid kyang /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i/_/ye shes tsham
analyzed: wa wa \u0f85_ham/_zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi don mngon du byas pa/_dngos po dang bcas bdag nyid kyang /_/gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam grol ba'i/_/ye shes tsham
translated: grasping and fixation of the self and entities.🔽Look with one’s individual knowledge.

original: du bsgom par bya/_/so so rang gi rig pas blta/_/hrih_yig zla ba'i steng gnas
analyzed: du bsgom par bya/_/so so rang gi rig pas blta/_/hrih_yig zla ba'i steng gnas
translated: The syllable hrih is on a moon.🔽From that, a white lotus arises.

original: pa/_/de skyes pad+ma dkar po bsam/_/hrih_yig dang ldan pad dkar las/_/
analyzed: pa/_/de skyes pad+ma dkar po bsam/_/hrih_yig dang ldan pad dkar las/_/
translated: From the white lotus with the syllable hrih,🔽the assembly of buddhas emanate,

original: de nas sangs rgyas tshhogs spros te/_/'gro ba sangs rgyas byas nas su/_/yang
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas tshhogs spros te/_/'gro ba sangs rgyas byas nas su/_/yang
translated: and after the world is made into buddhas,🔽they are again gathered into that.🔽From that transformation, there is a hā,

original: ni de ru gzhug par bya/_/de nyid gyur las ha la ste/_/zhal gsum phyag drug
analyzed: ni de ru gzhug par bya/_/de nyid gyur las ha la ste/_/zhal gsum phyag drug
translated: with three faces and six arms,🔽peaceful, with the ornaments of jewels,🔽standing in a mountain cave,

original: zhi ba'i chas/_/rin chen mi g.yo'i ri phug brten/_/pad+ma dmar dang zla
analyzed: zhi ba'i chas/_/rin chen mi g.yo'i ri phug brten/_/pad+ma dmar dang zla
translated: with a red lotus and moon.🔽The right leg is extended and the left leg is drawn in.

original: gnas pa'i/_/rol bas gnon cing yang dag gnas/_/dkar po ser po sngo
analyzed: gnas pa'i/_/rol bas gnon cing yang dag gnas/_/dkar po ser po sngo
translated: The first face is white, the second is yellow,🔽and the third is dark blue.🔽The right and left faces are red and black.

original: chen po/_/rtsha ba g.yon dang cig shos zhal/_/stag gi sham thabs spyan gsum pa//
analyzed: chen po/_/rtsha ba g.yon dang cig shos zhal/_/stag gi sham thabs spyan gsum pa//

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes mdzes yi/_/mchog sbyin phreng dang mda' g.yas phyag_/
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes mdzes yi/_/mchog sbyin phreng dang mda' g.yas phyag_/
translated: the right hand is in the boon-granting mudra, holding a garland and an arrow.🔽The left hand holds a breast,

original: g.yon pas 'dod pa'i nu ma 'dzin/_/pad+ma dkar po dbyug pa ni/_/yal ga
analyzed: g.yon pas 'dod pa'i nu ma 'dzin/_/pad+ma dkar po dbyug pa ni/_/yal ga
translated: and a white lotus, a club,

analyzed: gsum pa'i dbyug pa ste/_phyag gi yal ga dag gis bsnams/_/sna tshhogs me

original: tog gis bkang ba'i/_/g.yon par thod pa dgod par bya/_/sbrul gyis dkris
analyzed: tog gis bkang ba'i/_/g.yon par thod pa dgod par bya/_/sbrul gyis dkris
translated: In the left hand is a skull cup filled with various flowers.🔽The three-pronged vajra, wrapped with a snake,

original: pa'i rtshe gsum yang /_/de bzhin pad+ma'i steng g.yas dgod/_/dpag med
analyzed: pa'i rtshe gsum yang /_/de bzhin pad+ma'i steng g.yas dgod/_/dpag med

original: gtshug gi nor bu byas/_/thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/_/ral pa'i dbu
analyzed: gtshug gi nor bu byas/_/thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la brgyan/_/ral pa'i dbu

analyzed: rgyan cher 'dzings la/_/zla ba phyed pa'i dum bu ldan/_/rtog pa'i dra ba rnam
translated: a great topknot, with a half-moon crescent.🔽The light rays of the assembly of buddhas,

original: bcom pa'i/_/sangs rgyas tshhogs kyi 'od zer spro/_/ha la ha la 'dir gyur nas//
analyzed: bcom pa'i/_/sangs rgyas tshhogs kyi 'od zer spro/_/ha la ha la 'dir gyur nas//
translated: which destroy the net of conceptualization,🔽are emanated.🔽Having become a hala hala,🔽one should meditate on a hum in the heart,

analyzed: rang snying mgrin pa spyi bor yang /_/hu~m /ni bsgom par bya/_/zla ba la

analyzed: gnag dmar dkar rim/_/de bzhin snying dang mgrin pa'i bar/_/hrihyig
translated: The colors of the three seed syllables are black, red, and white, respectively.

original: zla ba la gnas pa/_/de ni brtan dang g.yo dngos kun/_/de yi rnam par
analyzed: zla ba la gnas pa/_/de ni brtan dang g.yo dngos kun/_/de yi rnam par

analyzed: bsgom par bya/_/log pa'i rnam rtog spangs nas su/_/mnyam par gzhag
translated: Abandoning false thoughts,🔽recite the mantra while remaining in meditative equipoise.🔽Om hala hala hrih

original: pas sngags bzlas bya/_/om ha la ha la hrih/_nang gi bzlas pa shin tu gsal/_/
analyzed: pas sngags bzlas bya/_/om ha la ha la hrih/_nang gi bzlas pa shin tu gsal/_/
translated: The inner recitation is very clear.🔽Not slow and not fast,

original: bul ba ma yin myur ba'ang min/_/ji ltar bde bas bzlas par bya/_/bsdus
analyzed: bul ba ma yin myur ba'ang min/_/ji ltar bde bas bzlas par bya/_/bsdus

analyzed: pas rab tu mchod pa bya/_/yang dag bstod cing brtan byas la/_/yi ge
translated: praise with the true praise, and stabilize with the hundred-syllable mantra.🔽Om vajrasattva samayam anupalaya🔽vajrasattva tvenopatistha

original: twe no pa tish+tha/_dr-i me b+ha ba/_su tosh+yo me b+ha ba/_a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/
analyzed: twe no pa tish+tha/_dr-i me b+ha ba/_su tosh+yo me b+ha ba/_a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/
translated: They are on moon discs, and you should meditate on them as the essence of all things animate and inanimate.🔽Abandoning false thoughts,🔽recite the mantra while remaining in meditative equipoise.🔽Om hala hala hrih🔽The inner recitation is very clear.🔽Not slow and not fast,🔽recite as comfortably as you can.🔽Make offerings with the concise offering,🔽praise with the true praise, and stabilize with the hundred-syllable mantra.🔽Om vajrasattva samayam anupalaya🔽vajrasattva tvenopatistha🔽draho me bhava sutosho me bhava suposhyo me bhava anurakto me bhava sarvasiddhim me prayatsa

original: su posh+yo me b+ha ba/_sarba sid+him+me pra yatsh+tshha/_sarba karma su tsha me/_tshit+tam gre yah_ku
analyzed: su posh+yo me b+ha ba/_sarba sid+him+me pra yatsh+tshha/_sarba karma su tsha me/_tshit+tam gre yah_ku
translated: sarvakarma suca me cittaṃ śreyaḥ kuru hūṃ ha ha ha ha ho🔽bhagavān vajrasattva samayastvam asi

analyzed: mdog dkar ba bltas te/_de las byung bar gyur pa'i 'od kyis mdun du bla

analyzed: nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis yang dag par mchod de/_sdig pa bshags pa
translated: Then, with light radiating from the seed syllable at your heart, make🔽offerings to them and confess your negative actions and so forth.

analyzed: la sogs pa byas nas/_om swa b+ha wa shud+d+hasarba d+harma__wa b+ha wa shud+d+ha\u0f85_ham zhes bya

analyzed: bas bdag nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs par bya ste/_sngon du bstan pa'i d+hih_yig

analyzed: @@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_ar+ya a ba lo ki ta shwa ra s+ya sha ta ak+sha ra

analyzed: sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yi ge

original: drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/_'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/dang po re zhig sngags pas bde ba'i gdan la 'dug ste/_kha dag pa la sogs pa

analyzed: byas nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa bltas te yang dag par mchod nas/_gsum

analyzed: la skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas/_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/_/
translated: having gone for refuge to the Three Jewels,🔽one should recite I go for refuge to the Three Jewels and so forth.

analyzed: skyes pa'am/_drod gsher las skyes pa'am/_gzugs can nam/_gzugs med pa'am/_'du shes can nam/_'du shes med pa'am/_yod min med

analyzed: min gyi 'du shes la sogs pa ji srid sems can gyi khams su gtogs pa brjod pa
translated: having a perception that is neither existent nor nonexistent, and so forth, for as long as one is included in the realm of sentient beings,🔽one should recite the mantra of the six syllables.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yi ge drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yi ge drug pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs/
translated: The Six-Syllable Practice of Noble Avalokiteśvara

translated: I will place all of them in the expanse of nirvāṇa without remainder of the aggregates.🔽Then recite “Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ” three times and meditate on emptiness

translated: for a moment.🔽Then, in one’s heart, on a white lotus and moon maṇḍala,🔽is a white hrīḥ.

analyzed: dus nas bsags pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i tshhogs khams

analyzed: gsum du gtogs pa dag par byas nas/_yi ge de nyid rang gi snying gar

analyzed: bcug pas/_de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi

analyzed: bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/_phyi ma'i phyag gnyis kyis snying gar thal mo sbyar zhing

translated: He has a crown of hair with a topknot of Amitābha.🔽To the right of him is Ratnasaṃbhava, with a similar complexion, hands, and implements, but with the two outer hands folded in añjali.

analyzed: pa'i rig pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshhan

analyzed: bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas om ma ha su kha badzra satwa dzah_hu~m bam hoh/_su ra ta stam

analyzed: a la la la la ho/_ahahah_ahzhes bya ba'i byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags

analyzed: brjod par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgoms nas 'jig rten mgon po'i thugs kar zla

analyzed: ba'i dkyil 'khor la phreng ba'i rnam pa lta bu'i dkar po zhal nas byung ste/_lte

analyzed: bar 'jug cing 'khor lo 'khor ba'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po
translated: enters the navel, and through the yoga of the revolving wheel,🔽this king of wish-fulfilling jewel mantra, the essence of all buddhas,

analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rtog pa sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas

analyzed: 'khor zhing 'jug pa la sogs pa thob nas/_dad pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa bla

analyzed: 'di brjod de gnas par bya'o/_/om badzra satwa sa ma ya/_ma nu pa la ya/

analyzed: badzra satwa twe no pa tish+tha dr-i rnyo me b+ha ba/_su tosh+yo me b+ha ba/_su posh+yo me b+ha ba/_a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/_sarba sid+d+him+me pra yatsh+tshha sarba karma su tsha me tshit+tam gre
translated: Vajrasattva Tvenopatistha Dridho Me Bhava Sutoṣyo Me Bhava Supoṣyo Me Bhava🔽Anurakto Me Bhava Sarvasiddhiṃ Me Prayaccha Sarva Karmasu Ca Me Cittaṃ Śreyaḥ Kuru Hūṃ

original: a ku ru hu~m/_ha ha ha ha hoh_b+ha ga ban sarba ta tha ga ta badzra ma me muny+tsha
analyzed: a ku ru hu~m/_ha ha ha ha hoh_b+ha ga ban sarba ta tha ga ta badzra ma me muny+tsha

analyzed: ya_b+ha ba ma ha sa ma ya satwa ltar zhes brjod la ji ltar bde bas gnas par bya'o//

analyzed: gi sgrub pa'i thabs/

analyzed: ste/_'gro ba'i don bya ba'i bsam pas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bdun

translated: One should place va in the middle, and ha in the north.🔽 One should recite the mantra Om marivim mama hum hum🔽phat phat svaha after having meditated on this.🔽In this way, one should bless the three times and abide in the yoga of the deity.🔽The sādhana of Māmakī as taught in the tantra is complete.🔽Translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the Khampa lotsāwa Bari Lotsāwa.🔽The sādhana of Māmakī as taught in the tantra, through the ritual as taught in the tantra.🔽

original: sku'i mdog go/_/g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po'o/_/g.yon pa'i zhal ni phag🔽rtog pa las gsungs pa'i cho gas 'od zer can dkar mo'i sgrub thabs/

translated: The color of his body is the color of his faces. His right face is black, his left face is a pig face,

original: pa'i phyag lnga rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gzhu dang /_mya ngan med
analyzed: pa'i phyag lnga rnams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_gzhu dang /_mya ngan med
translated: He has four legs, the right ones drawn in and the left ones extended.🔽He is adorned with all the ornaments and is in union with white Vārāhī.

original: pa'i yal ga dang /_zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /_skud pa🔽rnams phyag na'o/_/sna tshhogs pa'i rin po ches spras pa'i rna rgyan dang /_dbu🔽rgyan dang /_lag gdub dang /_dril bu g.yer kha dang bcas pa'i ska rags
analyzed: pa'i yal ga dang /_zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub dang /_skud pa rnams phyag na'o/_/sna tshhogs pa'i rin po ches spras pa'i rna rgyan dang /_dbu rgyan dang /_lag gdub dang /_dril bu g.yer kha dang bcas pa'i ska rags
translated: She has a branch, a noose, and a threatening gesture with a hooked knife in her right hands, and a skull cup, a lasso, and a chain in her left hands.

original: kyis gos kyi rnam par brgyan pa'i lus so/_/lang tshho dar la bab pa sha 'gag
analyzed: kyis gos kyi rnam par brgyan pa'i lus so/_/lang tshho dar la bab pa sha 'gag
translated: She is adorned with earrings, a head ornament, bracelets, anklets, and a belt made of various jewels, and her body is covered with a garment.

original: dang /_stod g.yogs dkar po mchod rten gyi khong du gnas pa'i phag pa
analyzed: dang /_stod g.yogs dkar po mchod rten gyi khong du gnas pa'i phag pa
translated: She is in the prime of youth, with full breasts and a slender waist.

original: bdun gyi shing rta la zhon pa'o/_/khyab 'jug dang /_dbang po dang /_bde
analyzed: bdun gyi shing rta la zhon pa'o/_/khyab 'jug dang /_dbang po dang /_bde
translated: She rides a chariot drawn by seven boars that are inside a stupa.

original: byed dang /_tshhangs pa zhabs bzhis mnan pa'o/_/de'i shing rta'i dbus su
analyzed: byed dang /_tshhangs pa zhabs bzhis mnan pa'o/_/de'i shing rta'i dbus su
translated: She tramples on Vishnu, Indra, Kama, and Brahma with her four feet.

original: gnas pa'i chu srin mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan te/_de yang sku
analyzed: gnas pa'i chu srin mnan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma gzhan te/_de yang sku
translated: In the center of her chariot is another Bhagavati trampling on a makara.

original: mdog nag mo phag gi gdong pa can/_rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub ni g.yas pa
analyzed: mdog nag mo phag gi gdong pa can/_rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub ni g.yas pa
translated: She is black and has the face of a pig. She holds a vajra and makes a threatening gesture with her right hands,🔽and a skull cup and a lasso with her left hands.

original: dang g.yon pa'i phyag na'o/_/g.yas phyogs su lha mo gzhan phag gi zhal dmar mo🔽phyag bzhi pa lcags kyu dang /_khab ni g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na'o/_/sdigs
analyzed: dang g.yon pa'i phyag na'o/_/g.yas phyogs su lha mo gzhan phag gi zhal dmar mo phyag bzhi pa lcags kyu dang /_khab ni g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na'o/_/sdigs

analyzed: mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang skud pa ni g.yon gyi phyag gnyis na'o/_/
translated: In her right hands she holds a hook and a needle, and in her left hands she holds a lasso with a threatening gesture and a thread.

original: rgyan bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon phyogs su rje btshun ma🔽gzhan te de yang phag zhal mdog dmar ba rna ba'i bar du bkang ba'i gzhu dang / mda' dang /_rdo rje dang /_mya ngan med pa'i yal ga ni g.yas dang /_g.yon pa'i
analyzed: rgyan bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'o/_/g.yon phyogs su rje btshun ma gzhan te de yang phag zhal mdog dmar ba rna ba'i bar du bkang ba'i gzhu dang / mda' dang /_rdo rje dang /_mya ngan med pa'i yal ga ni g.yas dang /_g.yon pa'i

translated: To the left of the principal goddess is another goddess, also with a red pig face. She has four arms. In her right hands she holds a bow and arrow, a vajra, and an ashoka branch, and in her left hands she holds a lasso with a threatening gesture and a thread.🔽She is adorned with various garments.

original: kyi tshhogs rnams lhung nas/_mi'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o/_/de lta bu'i
analyzed: kyi tshhogs rnams lhung nas/_mi'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'o/_/de lta bu'i
translated: Under the pig who is pulling the chariot are the nine great planets such as the sun, and the hosts of diseases that afflict beings. They are fallen and remain in human form.

original: gzugs kyi bcom ldan 'das ma bsams la/_snying gar zla ba la mam las byung
analyzed: gzugs kyi bcom ldan 'das ma bsams la/_snying gar zla ba la mam las byung
translated: Visualize the Bhagavatī of Form at the heart, arisen from maṃ on a moon.

original: ba'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bkug ste/_dbang bskur blangs nas
analyzed: ba'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa bkug ste/_dbang bskur blangs nas

analyzed: dbu la rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas

analyzed: dang /_dgra sta dang /_mda' dang /_gtun shing bsnams pa'o/_/

analyzed: g.yogs kyi gos can/_rtsha ba'i zhal ni dmar ba'o/_/dkar po dang /_nag

analyzed: 'bar ba/_rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/_sbrul dang rus pa'i rgyan

analyzed: gyis brgyan pa/_gnyug ma'i 'od zer gyis rnam pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms

analyzed: po dang /_ro langs phe phe gyi rnam pa dang /_ha ha'i 'jigs pa'i sgra

translated: It is adorned with eight charnel grounds.🔽In an instant, generate yourself as the glorious Ucchuṣma Sitātapatrā.🔽At the head, throat, and heart are oṃ, āḥ, and hūṃ.🔽Imagine that phaṭ is on all the limbs.

analyzed: phat kyi rnam pa bsam par bya'o/_/de nas lte ba'i steng du sna tshhogs pa'i pad+ma

analyzed: la zla ba nyi ma kha sbyor gyi dbus su hum gi rnam pa pad snod kyi rang bzhin sna tshhogs

analyzed: kyi mdog can gyi yi ge bsam par bya'o/_/om badzra d+ha ti shwa ri sarba dush+tan ha na

original: gyi gyi rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
analyzed: gyi gyi rim pa'i 'od zer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs

translated: Ha na, da ha da ha, pa tsa pa tsa, om mari byi mam, hum hum phat phat svaha.

analyzed: ta li hum phat/_bzlas pa'i sngags so/_/om ma ri tshi am mam hum hum phat bzlas

original: pa'i sngags gnyis pa'o/_/de nas thun mtshhams bzhir gtor ma'i sngags ni/🔽o a ral+li ho/_/_bam ba~m hoh_om badzra da ki ni sa ma ya stam dri _bya ho/_kha kha kha🔽hi kha hi sarba yak+sha rak+sha sa sa b+hu ta pre ta pi sha tsho na ma da a pasma ra da ki \u0f10da

translated: Then, at the four junctions of the day, the mantra for the torma is:

analyzed: yah_i dam ba lo \u0f10tha pi pa tha ma ti ka ma tha ma ha su kha bi \u0f10d+ha ye ma
translated: Om aralli ho, bam bam ho, om vajra dakini samaya stam dri bya ho, kha kha kha,🔽hi khahi sarva yaksha rakhasa sapta bhutas preta pisachas mardana apasmara dakini yaksha rakshasa vetala kumbhanda pisacha unmada kuraka unmada maha sukha vihaya yema,🔽mama sahayika bhava tha hum hum phat phat svaha.

analyzed: ma sa ha yika b+ha ba tha hum hum phat phat swa ha/_zas la sogs pa yang hrih_'i yi

original: bsgyur ba'o//_//
analyzed: bsgyur ba'o//_//
